pr_title: HDDS-3972. Add option to limit number of items displaying through ldb tool.

timeline.message: HDDS-3972.Add option to limit number of items while displaying through ldb tool.

timeline.bodyText:
MiniOzoneCluster is very heavy weight for this kind of testing. It's very slow (requires to start all the services) and easier to be flaky.
I would suggest to use pure rocksdb creation here (for example use pure DBStoreBuilder and create a pure rocksdb dir). Or if you prefer to test SCM specific rocksdb, you can use SCMMetadataStoreImpl
timeline.author: elek

replies.bodyText: I have used DBStoreBuilder now. But i had to create a db with the same name 'om.db' as the tool only reads from those DB whose DBDefinition is defined. I'm not sure whether that would be a problem.
replies.author: sadanand48
